properties.Name_of_th: From Kapila Bandara's house to Mrs. Manjula's House
properties.Observatio: An irrigation canal, The right bak and bottom of the canal have been concreted. The 85.0m long left bank section should be concreted.
properties.Descriptio: Construction of 1.0m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall

properties.Name_of_th: Huluganga - On both sides of the river
properties.Observatio: A major tributary of the Mahaweli River, Within the boundaries of this division, efforts are being made to prevent erotion by planting kubuk, Bamboo trees on the left bank of the river.
properties.Descriptio:
